item.title: Jaime add a quote by Martin Buber
item.description: "All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware." -- Martin Buber

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "What I am going to tell you about is what we teach our physics students in the third or fourth year of graduate school... It is my task to convince you not to turn away because you don't understand it. You see my physics students don't understand it... That is because I don't understand it. Nobody does." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description:
"My favourite definition of an intellectual: 'Someone who has been educated beyond his/her intelligence.
[<i>Sources and Acknowledgements</i>: Chapter 19]" -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jaime add a quote by T.H. White
item.description: "Education is experience, and the essence of experience is self-reliance." -- T.H. White

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
